Looks: Pretty attractive, normal/skinny, black hair, white hoodie, baggy jeans, has a smooth nice looking ass according to his friends.

Pre-Story:
Leox is a nice, normally intellegent shy guy, who seems to have a lot of trouble at home because of his parents constantly fighting, making his parents also abreact on him. After a while of depressive times and constant fighting, Leox couldn't take it anymore, and decided to abscond from his home, leaving all behind but some food to survive, his spare money and a note to his parents to update them, that he will be gone until they make up again. Right now, he is on his bike, back to his shelter he build himself in the great forest.

1112.content:
Name: Jake
Age: 18
Characteristics: Adventurous, Shy, Sweet
Looks: Handsome, very attractive, normal/skinny, brown hair, green shirt, jean shorts, said to be a bad boy in his class according to his friends.

Pre-Story:
Jake is a nice and very intelligent guy, but he's always been a rebel since puberty. He recently graduated from high school and is now alone in the real world. He's been alone for a few months when his parents died in a car crash. Jake wanted to stay in his hometown but couldn't afford to keep the house. His college funds has been revoked due to his bad grades and bad boy attitude. He was lucky to graduate from high school with a D average. He left his hometown and sold his house and used the money for food and supplies as he goes deep into the forest where no one would bother him ever again.
1112.title: Next character, please.

choices: The leader came to Jake with a friendly greeting.
The Hammer Bros. captured him as an intruder to the Koopa King's territory.
11121.content:
It has been a few months since he left his hometown, Jake has been in the forest for a very long time, his food supplies are getting low, and his camping gear were recently mauled by bears. For all he know, he's only got so little time left to live. Jake is starting to regret his decision on going deep into the forest, but he knows that his friends cannot help him when they all went off to college. He sometimes wish his parents are still alive, but he knows there's nothing he can do to bring them back.

One night, he set up his tent, which is still in bad condition due to that last bear attack. Jake is cooking the last of his food, a can of beans. it will make him gassy but its all he has left. Jake ate the beans and made sure to eat every last one to help him live longer. Soon he got so tired that he decided to turn in for the night and went into his damaged tent. During the night, Jake is having nightmares about his past. It includes his parents dying in a car crash, his school record being the lowest in his class, his rebellion got him in detention like 100 times, and his friends left for college leaving him behind.

The next morning, Jake woke up and finds that there's something outside his tent. He crawled out of his tent and finds that he is surrounded by an army of Hammer Bros. and his kind. Jake was very surprised for he didn't expect to see them outside video games. But why are they here? They must have a reason to show up.
11121.title: Go with Jake.

choices: He takes up on Hamma's offer.
He declines but is forced to go anyway.
111211.content:
The leading Hammer Brother walked up to Jake and extend his hand in greeting. "Hello," he said.
Jake didn't know what to say. He never met a real Hammer Brother before. He slowly takes the Hammer Bro's hand and said, "Hi."
"What is your name young traveler?" asked the Hammer Brother.
"My name is Jake," he answered. "What's yours?"
The Hammer brother replied, "Call me Hamma. And these are my bros. Boomer, Chili, Frosty, and Tubby." Jake saw the bros and figures out why they're called that. Hamma is the Hammer Brother and leader of his clan, Boomer is a Boomerang Bro, Chili is a Fire Bro, Frosty is an Ice Bro, and Tubby is a Sledge Bro. "The rest of the crew are just regular Hammer Bros. who are just lower class soldiers, and well they're idiots."
Jake giggled a bit, "I can see what you mean."
"So tell me, Jake," said Hamma. "What are you doing out here in the woods? Don't you know, you're in King Bowser's territory now?"
Jake has a surprised look on his face. "Um no, I didn't know that. In fact I didn't even know you guys existed. I left my hometown months ago, trying to get away from there. To be honest I have no place to go. My parents died in a car crash, my friends abandoned me, and I'm homeless now."
Hamma and his bros are surprised. "We're sorry to hear that. But I think we can help you out."
"Really?" asked Jake.
"Yeah, my boss, King Bowser, is looking to hire someone to be his um... well his personal slave if you will."
Jake his shocked. "His personal slave?"
"Yeah, something like that, you see King Bowser wants someone to have a little fun."
Jake is now confused. "What kind of fun, Hamma?"
"Well I think its best to let King Bowser tell you himself," said Hamma. "So, would you like to come with us to King Bowser's Castle?"
Jake thought for a moment. He always wanted to meet King Bowser in person. He's his favorite villain and loves to be as bad as he is. But you're unsure on what fun King Bowser has in mind. What's his decision?
111211.title: A friendly greeting.

1112111.content:
Jake thought for a moment and made his decison. "Hamma," he said. "I would be more than happy to go with you to King Bowser's Castle. King Bowser is my idol to be honest."
"Great," said Hamma. "Let's get going then. It's not safe here."
"Right."
"The castle is not far, but you'll be able to see the Mushroom Kingdom on the way."
Hamma and his Hammer Brother crew escorted Jake out of the forest and towards the Dark Land. Jake was surprised that he ended up in the Mushroom World, where all of the Super Mario games take place, where not all of them. Jake took the time to look around, he can see nearly everything that has eyes. From hills, trees, mushrooms, flowers, basically anything. He can see Yoshis, Goombas, Lakitus, etc. Soon they arrived in front of Bowser's Castle. Jake took a good look at it. The Castle is surrounded by a moat of lava. The entrance is shaped like Bowser's head, the top of the castle kinda looks like Bowser's shell. They walked inside, with Jake giggling imagining getting inside Bowser's mouth.

Hamma then spoke out loud, "Presenting his royal Majesty of the Koopa Clan, King Bowser Koopa." Jake looked up to see King Bowser sitting on his throne with a menacing look on his face. Next to him, his right hand Magikoopa Kamek, and next to Kamek, well she looks like an old Koopa who goes by the name Kammy.
Bowser then spoke, "What have you brought me, Hamma? Is he an intruder?"
"Yes sir," said Hamma. "But we learned that he left his hometown and has no food or a home. So I suggested that he come with us to go work for you."
"Is that right?" asked Bowser. "You there, come before me." Jake did as he was asked and walked up in front of Bowser, and he kneeled before him. He got a good look at the Koopa King. He is muscular, well the Koopa King does like to work out. His feet are huge, and to him it looks kinda tasty. His mouth looks menacing making Jake want to have a better look inside. And his belly is very huge, almost big enough to fit Jake inside. He is everything Jake could ever wanted. He has fallen in love with him. But he's not sure if Bowser feels the same way about him. "What is your name, human?"
"My name is Jake, your highness."
"So are you interested in being my personal slave?" the Koopa King asked.
"Well it depends on what I have to do," said Jake.
"Is that right? Well I say otherwise. You'll have to learn about that yourself."
Jake is surprised that Bowser doesn't want to tell him. He doesn't know if he's making the right decision. If he says yes, Bowser will do whatever pleases him, if not he says no, he'll probably be thrown into the dungeon. What does he say?
1112111.title: He takes up on Hamma's offer.

choices: It's Bowser Jr. or the Koopalings
11121111.content:
Jake then spoke, "Well you do look awesome. And I think working for you would be the best thing that's ever happened to me."
Bowser then brought a smile upon his face. "Excellent. I knew you'd see it my way." King Bowser turns to Hamma and his crew. Take him to my chambers, and while you're at it, tell the Koopalings and my son know about our new arrival."
Hamma and his crew gave a salute to the Koopa King and escorted Jake to Bowser's chamber. Jake asked Hamma when Bowser's not in sight. "Has he's always been that mean?"
"No not all the time," said Hamma. "But he has a reputation to uphold. He comes up with different schemes to kidnap Princess Peach of the Mushroom Kingdom, but they always fail thanks to the Mario Bros. but he does enjoys playing games with them, mostly because he thinks he can win."
"I see," said Jake. "And what about the Koopalings and his son?"
"To be honest," he said. "Some folks make mistakes and think the Koopalings are his kids, but King Bowser only has one son, and that's Prince Bowser, Jr."
"I hear they're kinda as sexy as Bowser himself," said Jake.
"Well that's why folks assume they're related," said Hamma.
"Hamma, can you keep a secret?" Jake asked.
"Sure," said Hamma. "What is it?"
Jake rubs his arms in embarassment. "Well, Bowser does look sexy, and well I think I love him."
Hamma made a giggle. "Hehe, I thought you might say that."
Jake then said, "But I'm not sure if he loves me."
Hamma looks to Jake. "Well maybe if you do a good job as his personal slave, you might find out for yourself."
Jake nods and they soon arrive in Bowser's chamber. Inside has everything a bedroom could have, it has a bed big enough for the Koopa King himself, a mirror for Bowser to look at himself, and a dresser for well, I'm not exactly sure.
"This is where you'll be sleeping," said Hamma. "You'll be sleeping with the Koopa King himself so that you'll not try to escape. If you need to use the bathroom, there's one right over there. And if you're hungry, you'll call upon our Yoshi friend, Boshi."
"Why is a Yoshi working for you guys?" asked Jake.
"I can't say," said Hamma. "It's classified information. Now if you'll excuse me, I must tell the Koopalings and Bowser Jr. about your arrival and then I'll be back on patrol. Good day, Mr. Jake."
"Good day to you too, Mr. Hamma."
Hamma leaves the bedroom and Jake is all alone having another look around. He looked out the window and can all of Dark Land, and in the distance he can see Princess Peach's Castle in the Mushroom Kingdom. Suddenly someone enters the bedroom, but who is it?
11121111.title: He says Yes.

111211111.content:
King Bowser returned from his throne room. "Okay then, Jake. Let me go over some rules for you, as a personal slave, you will do exactly as I say when I say it. For instance, if I want my feet rubbed, you rubbed them. If I want it licked you lick them. Am I clear so far?"
"Yes your majesty," said Jake.
"Oh please, just call me, Bowser," he said. "Everyone else will call me majesty, highness, or anything. You on the other hand are an exception."
"Okay, Bowser."
"Now then, at meal times, I want you to feed my meals to me."
"You mean I put food in your mouth?" Jake asked.
"Yeah that's right. Don't worry, I won't bite, hard." Jake gulps nervously. "You'll be slaves to my Koopalings too, as well as my son, but as King here, I am your top priority. Got it?"
"Yes sir, King Bowser," said Jake.
Bowser gets on his bed and lies flat on his back, or rather his shell. "Why don't you start by rubbing my huge feet."
Jake started rubbing Bowser's feet and they were huge, but nothing Jake can't handled. While Jake is working on Bowser's feet, Bowser starts speaking. "So Jake, where did you come from? Humans are very rare around the Mushroom world."
"I can't say, cuz I'm not going back," said Jake.
"And why is that?" King Bowser asked.
"Well to tell you the truth," Jake said, "I've had a lot of bad memories where I live. My parents died in a car crash, and my friends ditched me to go to college. I have no job, no home, and no purpose there."
"I'm sorry your life is terrible here," said King Bowser. "But you're gonna love working for me."
"Yeah," said Jake. "To be honest, King Bowser. I'm one of your biggest fans."
"Oh? I didn't know I had fans."
"Oh yes," said Jake. "You're one of the best villains I know. I've always wanted to meet you in person, I didn't know it was possible until now."
Bowser smiled as he's never been loved by a human before. "Well then, I think you and I are gonna get along just fine." Bowser wiggles his toes as Jake continues to rub his feet. Soon it was nighttime, and Bowser was getting ready for bed. "As Hamma told you, you'll be sleeping with me now."
Jake is a little nervous, as he has nothing but his boxers on. "I'm feeling a little awkward. I've never slept with someone in bed before, not counting my parents of course."
"It's fine, Jake. You got nothing to worry about." Jake walked quietly towards the bed and gets in it. "See?" Bowser wrapped his arms around Jake as they get settled in and started going to sleep. Jake is not feeling nervous anymore. Maybe it won't be so bad after all. Tomorrow will be the first day of the rest of his life.

112131.content:
Once upon a time there was kingdom called Primrose known for there beautiful meadow and garden but no flowers can pair to there kindhearted Princess Lilian and every morning she visited village and help her subjects with anything they need and sometimes play with children's or sometimes sing to them!

Princess Lilian life was full with happiness and love but that all change when Koopalings come into her kingdom. (Note Koopalings are bowser children and his older son Ludwig Von Koopa immediately fell in love with Princess Lilian)

(Ludwig Von Koopa Pov)
Me and my siblings run errands for Kammy, bag filled with ingredients and herd!

"Ludwig are we almost done get everything on Kammy list? Bowser Jr. complained.

"Yeah Luddy are we almost done?" Iggy asked. I stop walk and turn my head to look at Iggy direction with angry expression! "How many time have I told you never call me Luddy!" I yell.

"Wow, calm down Ludwig I was only kidding around!" Iggy said while chuckle little bit.

"Whatever but right now I want focus on get the last of ingredients for Kammy potion or else will be heard are father yell at us for failed to do simple errands!!" I said as siblings gasp as they start tumbling of thought of are father angrily.

"Ludwig is right? the last thing we need is King Dad yell at us!" Wendy said.

"How about we separate up to get last of ingredients?" Larry asked.

"That great idea it will get job quickly?" Lemmy said in happy tone.

"But I not want be all by myself!" Bowser Jr cried.

"Alright we separate up in team of two?" I said.

(After few min)

I couldn't believe out of my 7 siblings! Iggy the one I'm pair up with but at last we got ingredient when small mushroom kid bump into me which make me almost drop ingredient!

I glare at foolish mushroom kid (Oh once I am king first thing I am doing is make all mushroom children's stop with there foolish behavior along with other thing!) I thought as me and Iggy leave shop!

After that we head toward center of village as we about pass big tree in middle of center of village but then I immediately stop when I heard sing which sound absolutely perfect!

"Hey Luddy where are you going?" Iggy asked as he followed me while I follow sound of mysterious singer?

"If only you and I could go back in time and gather all the songs we used to hear

We're reach into the sky; your hands in mine, no worries just this happiness inside, just say you won't forget to stay by my side

I promise you I'll keep it till I die, so even if you find yourself all alone just know that in my heart you're always home

Don't you let the sadness in your heart, just let me be the light to help you start, I'll change the lonely sights you have inside,

Into this magic right before your eyes, I'll go to the hills, it's just you and me

I'm running there so fast I hardly see, I'll carry all our memories cause tomorrow we'll make a million more

Lalalalala, this song is for you, I'll sing until my heart is out of words, I hope you never leave me, so you can see my happiness is you."

my eyes widen along blushed cross my face as I see the most beautiful human woman I ever seen!

My heart start pound on my chest very fast as I stare at her and I sigh happier as I watch her smile and laugh but I was so focus on her I didn't even Iggy was tried get my attention.

(Iggy Koopa Pov)

"Come on Ludwig we need go home now that way dad not yell at us!" I said but Ludwig was sighed happily and smile as he stare at girl who was play with mushroom children's as they smile and laugh when I heard one of mushroom children "Thank you for sing for is Princess Lilian"

"Your welcome, it make me happy see all you enjoy my sing." She with sweet smile. As I turn my attention toward My older brother Ludwig who was completely mesmerized by her. He couldn't take his eyes off her.

"Hey Earth to Luddy! We still need get home and gave ingredients to Kammy?! Hello?!", I shouted, waving his hand in front of Ludwig' face.

"She's beautiful and her sing sound so perfect like angel..", Ludwig said as his eyes daze at her.

I slowly look at Princess Lilian and put together the puzzle. and then I gasp quickly realized Ludwig is in love with Princess Lilian!

But after few min Mushroom Children's went home and Princess Lilian did same! Ludwig was about follow her but I quickly punched him which quickly snap him out of it!

But soon Luddg start get angry at me as he grab me

"Why did you punch me for! You better have good reason!" he asked "Yeah I do you were focus on Princess Lilian! when we have get back home to gave Kammy the ingredients we got!" I answered

"Oh right, I guess completely forgot!" He said which complete surprised me because Luddy never forgot important stuff like this! I guess he must be really in love with Princess Lilian!

(After 2 hour)

Me and Ludwig gave ingredient to Kammy! "Did you get everything on my list?." She asked.

"Yes, Kammy we got everything you asked for." I said

Ludwig just had a lovesick look on his face and tuned everything out, as he slowly smile like doofus which mean he was daydream about Princess Lilian for again!

"She was so beautiful and her sing was so amazingly perfect!.." he said dreamily.

"Iggy? What got into your brother Ludwig?" Kammy asked with curiosity.

"Well you see when we were about leave Primrose kingdom but then Ludwig heard Princess Lilian sing but soon he saw her face! He started act like this!

And I start think Luddy fell head of over heels in love with Princess!

Kammy dropped some bags of ingredient on the ground after hearing this news!

"What he in love with Princess Peach?!" Kammy shouted.

"What no he not love with Princess peach! He in love with Princess Lilian! And she sing very pretty!

"Oh my gosh! What does she look like?!" Kammy asked.

"She have light pink hair, blue sapphire eyes shine like starlight, skin pale like the moonlight! Her perfectly thin hourglass body, she was so stunning beautiful!"Ludwig said in dreamily as he grab coatrack and dance around with it! Which I was guess he was pretend coatrack was Princess Lilian!
(Oh man I wish! I have cameras right now!) I thought as I laugh little bit.

"I never seen your older brother like this, He never interested in woman or be with him! He was always focus on King Bowser evil plot or his music!" Kammy said.

"Kammy when will that love potion be ready?" lower deep voice said as Kammy and Iggy turn to see King Bowser come in the room but only to find Ludwig dance with coatrack!

"Please tell me you didn't slip or make my older son Ludwig drink love potion which cause him to fell in love with Coatrack?" He asked.

"Majesty your older son Ludwig Von Koopa have fell in love with Princess Lilian from Primrose Kingdom!" Kammy said with smile.

info.brief_description: Get to Bowser, join his army or do some other naughtier stuff with the ''King''..
info.description:
The point of this interactive is to join Bowser's army, and maybe get a little closer with him, or his other minions.
- You can create your own character, but it's restricted to Human, Yoshi, and Bowser's Minions, ( like Goomba's, Boo's, etc. )
- If you don't want anything with Bowser, just make your own partner, maybe a general in Bowser's Army. But keep it to Mario-enemies/Yoshi's.
- Romance, please, make it a true love story, not one like: ''Hey, I just met you, let's fuck!'' I WILL delete these, as they are effortless stories.
- Sex is allowed. All kinds, if you want.
- Don't give a single option for creating a character, there must be ALWAYS place for a new one.
- Homosexuality is approved, straight is also allowed.
- Use Proper Grammar. It doesn't have to be perfect, but keep it in mind, okay? I will delete these too, if they are unreadable.
- Vore is allowed, all kinds, but NO hard vore. And no digestion or scat. Also, don't be scared to do Anal Vore, it's rare here and I LOVE it.
- Feet Fetish is allowed.
- Don't be shy to be a little gross, but please, keep it mildly gross, like farting in your partner's face, or rubbing your armpit in his face.

Well, that's about it. Have fun playing with the King or either minions! And remember, don't be shy to ask if you want something added in the rules.
Either way, have fun having love with Bowser and his minions!
